languages.text: "Вы буквально говорите о взятке. Бессмысленный акт — кибермастифов невозможно подкупить, как и арбитров".

traits.locale_text: "Подкуп не сработает с Глейто, он не обычная собака. Вы вступили в несанкционированный контакт с боевым орудием".

languages.text: "You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."
languages.original_text: "Вы буквально говорите о взятке. Бессмысленный акт — кибермастифов невозможно подкупить, как и арбитров".

traits.locale_text: "You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."
"You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."
"You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."
"You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."
"You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."

languages.text: 「お前が言っているのは、文字通りの贈賄行為だよ。それは無意味な行動なんだ。サイバーマスチフは買収できないし、アービトレイターも同様だ」
languages.original_text: "You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が言っているのは、文字通りの贈賄行為だよ。それは無意味な行動なんだ。サイバーマスチフは買収できないし、アービトレイターも同様だ」

languages.text: "Bu bahsettiğin şey düpedüz rüşvet. Kaldı ki nafile bir girişim. Siber mastifler rüşvet almaz. Yargıcılar da öyle."
languages.original_text: "You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: "Bu bahsettiğin şey düpedüz rüşvet. Ancak bu, nafile bir girişim. Siber mastifler rüşvet almazlar. Yargıcılar da öyle."

languages.text: «Eso es, literalmente, soborno. Es inútil. No se puede sobornar a un cibermastín, ni tampoco a un Arbitrator».
languages.original_text: "You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es, literalmente, soborno. Es inútil. No se puede sobornar a un cibermastín, ni tampoco a un Arbitrator».

languages.text: “你指的是贿赂行为。这种做法毫无意义，生化獒犬是无法被收买的，法务官也同样如此。”
languages.original_text: "You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: “你指的是贿赂行为。这种做法毫无意义，生化獒犬是无法被收买的，法务官也同样如此。”

languages.text: « Vous êtes littéralement en train de décrire une tentative de corruption. Un acte futile : les cyber-mastiffs ne peuvent être achetés, à l'instar des arbitrators. »
languages.original_text: "You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes littéralement en train de décrire une tentative de corruption. Un acte futile : les cyber-mastiffs ne peuvent être achetés, à l'instar des arbitrators. »

languages.text: "Das nennt man Bestechung. Ein sinnloses Unterfangen ... Cyber-Mastiffs sind ebenso unbestechlich wie Arbitratoren."
languages.original_text: "You are literally talking about bribery. A pointless act — cyber-mastiffs cannot be bribed, and neither can Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: "Das nennt man Bestechung. Ein sinnloses Unterfangen ... Cyber-Mastiffs sind ebenso unbestechlich wie Arbitratoren."
